trends: There have been no other sightings in Williamstown
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details5:50pm Bright flash as if the craft was decending from a worm hole. After the flash the craft was a dark metal or black sphere about asprin sided. It moved very fast from horizon to horizon until out of sight. There were Aircraft in the air which seemed to be at the same altitude ( 35,000-40,000) cruising altitude with cond trails. This craft was easily 2 to 3 times as fast. Around 7:30 the same night I saw what I have seen before, a small star-like orb moving slowly in the north.My Father (retired Air Force A-10 mechanic)saw it with me and immediately said this is no known aircraft.The first sighting startled me, I have neever seen ANYTHING like this before.
Summary: Orb flashed very bright amber as if it descended from a worm hole. Then moved very quickly across the sky from south west to north
